ygData.subject: Re: Test of Truth:  No Venom Sacks!
ygData.msgSnippet: They are just rare.  I have found them on the tarantulas a number of times..you may just have to auction and see if someone has gotten one that day. Grod ...
ygData.messageBody:
They are just rare. I have found them on the tarantulas a number of
times..you may just have to auction and see if someone has gotten one that
day.

Grod

-----Original Message-----
From: David [mailto:dnolle@...]

To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Test of Truth: No Venom Sacks!


From: David <dnolle@...>

Hello,
I've killed over 10 Desert Tarantulas but haven't found the Venom Sacks I
need to get my "Token of Courage" for the Test of Truth Quest. Am I doing
something wrong?

Pendor Paldan of the 6th Level
